 17 /**
 18  * Creates a textured quad scene.
 19  *
 20  * @param {HTMLElement} world element used as container for 
 21  * the world coordinate system.
 22  * @param {number} scale the scaling factor to use to avoid 
 23  * numeric errors.
 24  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} view the 3d-coordinates of the viewer
 25  *
 26  * @class A scene consisting of a number of quads, all with
 27  * a unique texture. Used by the {@link bigshot.VRPanorama} to render the VR cube.
 28  *
 29  * @see bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuad
 30  */
 31 bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuadScene = function (world, scale, view) {
 32     this.quads = new Array ();
 33     this.world = world;
 34     this.scale = scale;
 35     this.view = view;
 36 }
 37 
 38 bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuadScene.prototype = {  
 39     /** 
 40      * Adds a new quad to the scene.
 41      *
 42      * @param {bigshot.TexturedQuad} quad the quad to add to the scene
 43      */
 44     addQuad : function (quad) {
 45         this.quads.push (quad);
 46     },
 47     
 48     /** 
 49      * Renders all quads.
 50      */
 51     render : function () {            
 52         for (var i = 0; i < this.quads.length; ++i) {
 53             this.quads[i].render (this.world, this.scale, this.view);
 54         }
 55     }
 56 };
 57
